mapper.select: select doctitle from DIGT_DOC where docno=#{docNo}

SELECT a.REQ_DTTM,a.AUTH_NO,d.DOCTITLE,e.EMP_NM AS REQ_NM ,r.EMP_NM AS RES_NM ,a.auth_dvcd FROM digt_auth a JOIN digt_doc d on(a.docno=d.docno) JOIN employee e on(a.req_empno=e.emp_no) JOIN employee r on(a.res_empno=r.emp_no) where e.EMP_NO=#{empNo}
SELECT a.REQ_DTTM,a.AUTH_NO,d.DOCTITLE,e.EMP_NM AS REQ_NM ,a.auth_dvcd FROM digt_auth a JOIN digt_doc d on(a.docno=d.docno) JOIN employee e on(a.req_empno=e.emp_no) where a.res_empno = #{empNo}

SELECT doc.DOCTITLE,dept.DEPT_NM,emp.emp_nm,auth.TITLE,CONTENT,auth.auth_dvcd FROM DIGT_AUTH auth join DIGT_DOC doc ON(auth.docno=doc.docno) join DEPARTMENT dept on(auth.res_deptno=dept.dept_no) join employee emp on(auth.res_empno=emp.emp_no) where auth_no=#{authNo}
